import React, { Fragment, useContext } from "react"; import ProductCategoryDropdown from "./ProductCategoryDropdown"; import { HomeContext } from "./index"; const ProductCategory = (props) => { const { data, dispatch } = useContext(HomeContext); return (
dispatch({ type: "categoryListDropdown", payload: !data.categoryListDropdown, }) } className={`flex items-center space-x-1 cursor-pointer ${ data.categoryListDropdown ? "text-yellow-700" : "" }`} > Loại sản phẩm
dispatch({ type: "filterListDropdown", payload: !data.filterListDropdown, }) } className={`flex items-center space-x-1 cursor-pointer ${ data.filterListDropdown ? "text-yellow-700" : "" }`} > Lọc
/
dispatch({ type: "searchDropdown", payload: !data.searchDropdown, }) } className={`flex items-center space-x-1 cursor-pointer ${ data.searchDropdown ? "text-yellow-700" : "" }`} > Tìm kiếm
); }; export default ProductCategory;
